name: Circle of the Moon
description: Druids of the Circle of the Moon are fierce guardians who transform into powerful beasts, excelling at combat wild shape.

2.name: Combat Wild Shape
2.description: You can use Wild Shape as a bonus action and expend spell slots to heal while transformed.

2.name: Circle Forms
2.description: You can transform into more dangerous beasts than normal druids.

6.name: Primal Strike
6.description: Your beast attacks count as magical for overcoming resistance and immunity.

10.name: Elemental Wild Shape
10.description: You can expend uses of Wild Shape to transform into an elemental.

14.name: Thousand Forms
14.description: You can cast alter self at will.
